verses.verse: After <WG3326> these things <WG5023> Jesus <WG2424> manifested <WG5319> himself <WG1438> again <WG3825> to the disciples <WG3101> at <WG1909> the sea <WG2281> of Tiberias <WG5085>; and <WG1161> he <WG5319> manifested himself on this wise <WG3779>.

Peter <WG4074> therefore seeing <WG1492> him <WG5126> saith <WG3004> to Jesus <WG2424>, Lord <WG2962>, and <WG1161> what <WG5101> shall this man do <WG3778>?
